chunk:
RBA Skincare Quench Moisturizer

Brand: RBA Skincare

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Organic Aloe Vera, Organic Jojoba Seed Oil, Organic Grapeseed)Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 60, PEG-150 Stearate, Organic Evening Primrose Oil, Vitamin E, Witch Hazel,  Xanthan Gum, Organic Black Willowbark Extract, Mannan, Organic Neem Seed Oil, Rosemary Leaf Extract, Citric Acid

Directions: Massage a dime size drop onto your face, neck and decollete. Use daily morning & evening.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
